text:
- [Narrator] When building
multi-region applications,

you want them to be highly
available and resilient.

You also need these applications
to provide microsecond read

and single-digit write latency
across multiple AWS regions.
Custom solutions are often error-prone
and impose a high operational burden.

Amazon MemoryDB is a Valkey
and Redis OSS-compatible

in-memory database service
with Multi-AZ durability
and microsecond read

and single-digit
millisecond write latency.

Its new feature, Amazon
MemoryDB Multi-Region,

is a fully managed, multi-region
active-active database
providing up to 99.999% availability.

MemoryDB Multi-Region also
enables your application
to simultaneously read and write
to any MemoryDB regional endpoint,
enhancing application resiliency.

It enables you to serve
reads and writes locally
from the regions closest to your users.
You can also choose

to automatically replicate
your MemoryDB data
across up to five regions.

Keep your applications highly
available and resilient
with Amazon MemoryDB Multi-Region.
